Address.value: HADASSAH EIN KEREM CAMPUS,JERUSALEM BIOPARK, 2ND FLOOR, JERUSALEM, 74036, Israel

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BiondVax Pharmaceuticals Ltd is engaged in the healthcare sector. Its main activity is the commercialization and manufacturing of flu vaccine. Its product is designed to provide multi-season and multi-strain protection against some human influenza virus strains, including both seasonal and pandemic flu strains. The company recently concluded two Phase I/II trials in which the multimeric-001 universal flu vaccine was shown to be safe and immunogenic.
